summary:
adds my character as a follower, she have her own quest in order to find her 
she is the first follower for my mod series \"Vintage Followers\"
descriptionHtml:
Dagail (Da-Gale) is my main character she is a darkelf and is good with any weapon 

Requirements
Enhanced Character Edit by tktk
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951 
EDECC by Vintage9
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27788
Hair packs of Fallout3 by Radioragae
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17993

Just dump the esp into your data files in order to install. Remove it in order to UN Install

i cannot tell you where she is because that would ruin the quest so in order to find her you must find her journals ill start you off with a riddle \"you didn\'t think id just simply TELL you where the 1st journal was did you?\"

Riddle:\"In a place filled of thieves, a city a jarl, the archives no but where to find the mysterious journal is behind cell doors guarded by mortals\"

leave a comment if you cannot solve the riddle :3
author: Vintage9
